snippet.title: Math it Right 3D Adventure, The Arithmetic and Times Tables Treasure Hunt for Kids, Trailer
snippet.description:
Play some great and exciting math challenges with Math it Right 3D Adventure, the only math game you need for your kids aged 6 to 9 years old. Join Pilipili the dragon on his quest to master the foundation of arithmetic operations and times tables, defeat the mischievous Thanatos and save your friends from Dragon City. Math it Right 3D Adventure is the numbers' wonderlands on iOS, Android, Windows, and macOS.  

https://jauntybear.com/games/math-it-right-3d-adventure
